nodes.text: Republic storage depot AB-119 was a Galactic Republic storage depot built in a cave in the Whiterock Wastes on the ice planet Hoth. During the Galactic War, a smuggler captain working with the Republic was deceived by Languss Tuno, who was posing as a Jedi, into attacking the facility to steal sensors. After destroying the droids protecting the facility and retrieving the sensors, the smuggler was confronted by Republic Lieutenant Kollis.
